about_the_game:
Battle Runes 1 Spell Effect Tokens


Battle Runes are for those of us who enjoy adding functional visual flair to their games.

Contents:

20 Tokens in both small and large format (total of 40).

Place them under characters or monsters to represent conditions, or to visually show environmental effects, or locations of objects and traps.

For example; 'That monster is on fire!' - Add a Fire Battle Rune under it for as long as the fire effect lasts and if the fire spreads, add another token.

The tokens are aimed to be flexible and cover a multitude of spells and effects.

Converted by: Greg Taylor

Released on October 24, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
